Blacksmith Helton: Hmmph, who are you? Why did you come here? Unless you've brought a keg of beer, I have no time to spare in idle chatter. Heat it, heat it, bake it, cool it down! That's my craft! Through fire and water, I fashion stout armor and blades sharp enough to cut the wind itself. What do you want?
